errors.error_description: The hyperlink to the examples directory is broken. It incorrectly points to a singular `example` directory instead of the correct plural `examples` directory.
correction_candidates: Change the link `.../blob/master/example/` to point to `.../tree/master/examples/`.
Change the link `.../blob/master/example/` to point to `.../blob/main/examples/`.
Change the link `.../blob/master/example/` to point to `.../blob/master/docs/examples/`.
Change the link `.../blob/master/example/` to point to `.../blob/master/examples/`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the link `.../blob/master/example/` to point to `.../blob/master/examples/`.
